actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide recognition to the Women's Air Force Service Pilots for their service to their country during World War II by deeming such Service to have been active duty in the Armed Forces of the United States for purposes of laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Designates service as a Member of the Women's Air Forces Service Pilots as active duty for the purposes of all laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to provide recognition to the Women's Air Force Service Pilots for their service to their country during World War II by deeming such Service to have been active duty in the Armed Forces of the United States for purposes of laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.
